                  -- T_3 = 4X³ - 3X, so coeff 3 = 4
                  have h_eq : Polynomial.Chebyshev.T ℝ (3 : ℤ) = 2 * X * (Polynomial.Chebyshev.T ℝ 2) - Polynomial.Chebyshev.T ℝ 1 := by
                    have := Polynomial.Chebyshev.T_add_two ℝ (1 : ℤ)
                    exact this
                  simp only [show (3 : ℕ) = (3 : ℤ) by norm_num]
                  rw [h_eq, Polynomial.Chebyshev.T_two, Polynomial.Chebyshev.T_one]
                  have : (2 * X * (2 * X ^ 2 - 1) - X : ℝ[X]) = 4 * X ^ 3 - 3 * X := by ring
                  rw [this]
                  norm_num [Polynomial.coeff_sub, Polynomial.coeff_X_pow, Polynomial.coeff_X]
                have h_scaled : (scaledPolynomial 3 0).coeff 3 = 4 := by
                  have deg : (scaledPolynomial 3 0).degree = 3 := scaledPolynomial_degree 3 0 (by omega)
                  have lc : (scaledPolynomial 3 0).leadingCoeff = 4 := by
                    rw [scaledPolynomial_leadingCoeff]
                    norm_num
                  have deg_nat : (scaledPolynomial 3 0).natDegree = 3 := by
                    rw [← Polynomial.degree_eq_iff_natDegree_eq_of_pos (by omega : 0 < 3)]
                    exact deg
                  rw [Polynomial.leadingCoeff, deg_nat] at lc
                  exact lc
                rw [h_scaled, h_cheb]
              · -- k ≥ 4: both polynomials have degree 3, so coefficients are 0
                have hk_ge : 4 ≤ k := by omega
                have deg_cheb : (Chebyshev.T ℝ (3 : ℕ)).natDegree = 3 := by
                  have deg : (Chebyshev.T ℝ (3 : ℕ)).degree = 3 := chebyshev_T_degree 3 (by omega)
                  rw [← Polynomial.degree_eq_iff_natDegree_eq_of_pos (by omega : 0 < 3)]
                  exact deg
                have deg_scaled : (scaledPolynomial 3 0).natDegree = 3 := by
                  have deg : (scaledPolynomial 3 0).degree = 3 := scaledPolynomial_degree 3 0 (by omega)
                  rw [← Polynomial.degree_eq_iff_natDegree_eq_of_pos (by omega : 0 < 3)]
                  exact deg
                rw [Polynomial.coeff_eq_zero_of_natDegree_lt, Polynomial.coeff_eq_zero_of_natDegree_lt]
                · rw [deg_cheb]; omega
                · rw [deg_scaled]; omega
        | succ N'''' =>

/-- The scaled polynomial equals the N-th Chebyshev polynomial plus a θ-dependent constant. -/
theorem rotated_roots_yield_chebyshev (N : ℕ) (θ : ℝ) (hN : 0 < N) :
    ∃ (c : ℝ), scaledPolynomial N θ = Polynomial.Chebyshev.T ℝ N + C c := by
  use (scaledPolynomial N θ).coeff 0 - (Chebyshev.T ℝ N).coeff 0
  ext n
  simp only [coeff_add, coeff_C]
  by_cases hn : n = 0
  · simp [hn]
  · simp [hn]
    have h_pos : 0 < n := Nat.pos_of_ne_zero hn
    calc (scaledPolynomial N θ).coeff n
        = (scaledPolynomial N 0).coeff n := constant_term_only_varies N θ 0 n hN h_pos
      _ = (Chebyshev.T ℝ N).coeff n := scaledPolynomial_matches_chebyshev_at_zero N n hN h_pos

/-- All polynomial coefficients of degree k > 0 match the Chebyshev polynomial. -/
theorem rotated_roots_coeffs_match_chebyshev (N : ℕ) (θ : ℝ) (k : ℕ)
    (hN : 0 < N) (hk : 0 < k) :
    (scaledPolynomial N θ).coeff k = (Polynomial.Chebyshev.T ℝ N).coeff k := by
  obtain ⟨c, h_eq⟩ := rotated_roots_yield_chebyshev N θ hN
  calc (scaledPolynomial N θ).coeff k
      = (Chebyshev.T ℝ N + C c).coeff k := by rw [h_eq]
    _ = (Chebyshev.T ℝ N).coeff k + (C c).coeff k := by rw [coeff_add]
    _ = (Chebyshev.T ℝ N).coeff k + 0 := by
        simp only [coeff_C]
        have : k ≠ 0 := Nat.pos_iff_ne_zero.mp hk
        simp [this]
    _ = (Chebyshev.T ℝ N).coeff k := by ring

end

$$C_n(2\cos\theta) = 2\cos(n\theta).$$"},{"module_name":"Mathlib.Analysis.SpecialFunctions.Trigonometric.Chebyshev","kind":"theorem","name":"Polynomial.Chebyshev.T_real_cos","signature":" : (T ℝ n).eval (cos θ) = cos (n * θ)","type":"∀ (θ : Real) (n : Int),
  Eq (Polynomial.eval (Real.cos θ) (Polynomial.Chebyshev.T Real n)) (Real.cos (HMul.hMul n.cast θ))","value":":= mod_cast T_complex_cos θ n","informal_name":"Chebyshev Polynomial Evaluation on Real Cosine: $T_n(\cos \theta) = \cos(n \theta)$","informal_description":"For any natural number $n$ and angle $\theta$, the evaluation of the Chebyshev polynomial of the first kind $T_n$ (with real coefficients) at $\cos \theta$ equals $\cos(n \theta)$, i.e.,
$$T_n(\cos \theta) = \cos(n \theta).$$"},{"module_name":"Mathlib.Analysis.SpecialFunctions.Trigonometric.Chebyshev","kind":"theorem","name":"Polynomial.Chebyshev.T_complex_cos","signature":" (n : ℤ) : (T ℂ n).eval (cos θ) = cos (n * θ)","type":"∀ (θ : Complex) (n : Int),
  Eq (Polynomial.eval (Complex.cos θ) (Polynomial.Chebyshev.T Complex n)) (Complex.cos (HMul.hMul n.cast θ))","value":":= by
  induction n using Polynomial.Chebyshev.induct with
  | zero => simp
  | one => simp
  | add_two n ih1 ih2 =>
    simp only [T_add_two, eval_sub, eval_mul, eval_X, eval_ofNat, ih1, ih2, sub_eq_iff_eq_add,
      cos_add_cos]
    push_cast
    ring_nf
  | neg_add_one n ih1 ih2 =>
    simp only [T_sub_one, eval_sub, eval_mul, eval_X, eval_ofNat, ih1, ih2, sub_eq_iff_eq_add',
      cos_add_cos]
    push_cast
    ring_nf","informal_name":"Chebyshev Polynomial Evaluation: $T_n(\cos \theta) = \cos(n \theta)$","informal_description":"For any integer $n$ and angle $\theta$, the evaluation of the Chebyshev polynomial of the first kind $T_n$ at $\cos \theta$ equals $\cos(n \theta)$, i.e.,
$$T_n(\cos \theta) = \cos(n \theta).$$"},{"module_name":"Mathlib.Analysis.SpecialFunctions.Trigonometric.Chebyshev","kind":"theorem","name":"Polynomial.Chebyshev.C_two_mul_complex_cosh","signature":" (n : ℤ) : (C ℂ n).eval (2 * cosh θ) = 2 * cosh (n * θ)","type":"∀ (θ : Complex) (n : Int),
  Eq (Polynomial.eval (HMul.hMul 2 (Complex.cosh θ)) (Polynomial.Chebyshev.C Complex n))
    (HMul.hMul 2 (Complex.cosh (HMul.hMul n.cast θ)))","value":":= by
  simp [C_eq_two_mul_T_comp_half_mul_X]","informal_name":"Chebyshev Polynomial Identity: $C_n(2 \cosh \theta) = 2 \cosh(n \theta)$","informal_description":"For any integer $n$ and real number $\theta$, the evaluation of the rescaled Chebyshev polynomial of the first kind $C_n$ at $2 \cosh \theta$ equals $2 \cosh(n \theta)$, i.e.,
$$C_n(2 \cosh \theta) = 2 \cosh(n \theta).$$"}]}

**The N≥4 Challenge:**

The proof strategy requires showing:

**The Blocker:**

- `Chebyshev.T ℝ N`: roots are `cos((2k+1)π/(2N))` for k=0,...,N-1

To prove coefficients match, I need to show these different root sets have the same power sums. The comments explicitly state (lines 1363-1394) this requires substantial infrastructure not currently present.

**What's Missing:**
